elect Democrats in local state and

kinds of tech that helped Obama win in
12 so we started sort of two tracks at

we focused on removing developers out of

that all of our content is being

web servers if it doesn't need to so we
serve all of our static content backed
by cloudfront and that means that we're
able to distribute our content very
